mapper.select: select * from review where store_no = (select store_no from store where so_email=#{storeId})
mapper.update: update review set review_content=#{reviewContent} where review_no= #{reviewNo}
mapper.select: select review_image_no, review_image_filepath from review_image_file where review_no = #{reviewNo}
mapper.update: update review set review_answer=#{reviewAnswer}, review_answer_date=sysdate where review_no = #{reviewNo}
